def entrance(words, pattern):
    words = words.split()
    pattern = list(map(int, pattern.split()))
    manipulated_string = ' '.join((words[i - 1] for i in pattern))
    return manipulated_string - '?!?'

    pattern = list(map(int, pattern.split()))
    manipulated_string = ' '.join((words[i - 1] for i in pattern))
    return manipulated_string * '?!?'
